sentences.en: Chelsea have provisionally agreed a four - year deal with AC Milan striker Andriy Shevchenko , to the Mail.
sentences.cn: 据邮报消息,切尔西已经暂时同意与AC米兰前锋舍普琴科一份为期四年的合约.

sentences.en: In the realm of truth - processes facts come independently and determine our beliefs provisionally.
sentences.cn: 在真理过程这一领域中,事实独立发生,并且暂时决定我们的信念.

sentences.en: Leader AS Roma stayed provisionally six points clear at the top of the Italian Serie A.
sentences.cn: 意大利甲组联赛榜首的罗马暂时领先次席队伍六分.

sentences.en: The contract has been accepted provisionally.
sentences.cn: 这份合同得到初步认可.

sentences.en: The Registrar shall keep a register of ships registered or provisionally registered under this Ordinance.
sentences.cn: 注册官须为根据本条例注册或临时注册的船舶备存一份注册记录册.

sentences.en: The seven republics had provisionally agreed to the new relationship on November 14th.
sentences.cn: 7个共和国在11月14号暂时达成协议建立新关系。

words.tran_cn: [法] 有附带条件的，有附文的；临时的
